answerText: The Kingdom of this World[10] The Kingdom of This World is the major achievement of this Belgian-born writer. A man tries to evade police by jumping into a performance of Beethoven's pastoral symphony in his novel The Chase.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 1 | 17 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this novel consisting of tightly intertwined vignettes, such as that about Mackandal's role as the "Lord of Poison," as well as Henri Christophe's construction of the Citadel.
